resources.string: create table if not exists unupbeacon (mac_id text,uuid text, rssi text, major text, minor text,type text,timestamp text);
create table if not exists major_filter (major text);
create table if not exists uuid_filter (uuid text);
create table if not exists type_filter (type text);
create table if not exists beacon_location (mac_id text,rssi text, major text,date text);
